capabilities.capability: This transformation allows IAP users to remove duplicates from an array of primitives

entryPoint.name: Remove Duplicates From Array of Primitives - IAP

inputs.name: array
inputs.description: Array of primitives to remove duplicates from. An array can hold elements of various data types, including numbers, strings, boolean, null

outputs.name: uniqueArray
outputs.description: Array containing the elements from the input array without any duplicates

name: Remove Duplicates From Array of Primitives - IAP
overview: Remove duplicates from an array of primitives
webName: Remove Duplicates From Array of Primitives - IAP
